title: Advise client on upgrading to ssl migration
description: Advise to switch hosting providers from Godaddy to BlueHost as the latter makes it free and easy to add a ssl certificate.

helpfulResources.name: BlueHost
helpfulResources.usefulness: A highlighted feature is that "Free SSL Certificate Included"

title: Create log web application to easily track daily accomplishments
description: An application that provides a single place to log your work history.  It can be used for any task that you want.  The tasks can be individually shared with the public or made private.

helpfulResources.name: Github
helpfulResources.usefulness: Using it to host this project

helpfulResources.usefulness: Find flags to allow chrome to read local files before server implemented

helpfulResources.name: Beebom
helpfulResources.usefulness: Exposed me to more flags to allow features I did not know chromw has i.e. a password generator

helpfulResources.name: Medium - Debugging Node.js with Chrome
helpfulResources.usefulness: Great article on using chrome to debug a node application

helpfulResources.name: StackOverflow - How to auto-reload file in Node.js
helpfulResources.usefulness: Learned about nodemon that is a tool which watches for file changes and restarts node when they occur.

helpfulResources.name: You Only Wish MongoDB Wasn't relational
helpfulResources.usefulness: Found via [StackOverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11775222/mongodb-linked-collections) answer and it helps aviods pitfalls of putting everything details of an object into a single document.  It suggest that some "relational" practices are needed to be able to effectively query data and it will not noticably reduce performance.

tasks.title: Research and add mongoDB to store data
tasks.explanation: This will allow the application to store the data in a database instead of a json file
